price: (ចូរចងចាំ)នៅពេលដែលគេបានពោលទៅកាន់ឪពុក របស់គេនិងក្រុមរបស់គេថាៈ តើពួកអ្នកកំពុងតែគោរពសក្ការៈអ្វី?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
